description: This file provides an async function getOpenAIMove that interacts with the OpenAI API to determine the next move in a Tic Tac Toe game for the 'O' player. It constructs a prompt from the current board state, sends a request to the API, and parses the response to extract a move index.

methods.name: getOpenAIMove(board)
methods.description: Asynchronously calls the OpenAI API with the current board state to retrieve the recommended move index for 'O'. Returns the index (0-8) or null if an error occurs.
